Jenis Valda Glickardus

  1. Alternate Birth Name: James
  2. Foster Name: Albert James
  3. Foster Family: Henry and Mary Sommer
  4. Location of Family: Butte, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital

  7. Age on Arrival: 2
  8. Date of Birth: 11/30/1910, New York City, NY
  9. Date of Death: 5/31/1990
  10. Gender: male
  11. Spouse Name: Dorothy Sommer
  12. Source: OTR, 13; Eloise Thomsen Corres.
